definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: These things she did without a word and without being commanded to do them.
sentences.chinese: 這些活計，她總是一聲不響地去幹，沒有誰支使她。

sentences.english: We walk around every day till our feet ache but we can't find anything.
sentences.chinese: 每天我們走得腳都疼了，卻還是找不到任何活計。

sentences.english: Fools and bairns should not see half-done work.
sentences.chinese: 活計未完不給傻瓜和孩子看。

sentences.english: Will you help us with all this re-decorating?
sentences.chinese: 你幫助我們做重新裝飾房間的所有活計好嗎？

sentences.english: I turn from my work and my eyes fill with the mist.
sentences.chinese: 我放下活計眼裏充滿霧水。

sentences.english: Tess blushed a little, but still did not pause in her work.
sentences.chinese: 苔絲微微有些臉紅，但仍沒有停下手裏的活計。

sentences.english: Each child of the six of us had after-school duties.
sentences.chinese: 放學後我們六個孩子毫不例外都有課後的活計要幹。

sentences.english: Some one was busy with her work, and her bangles made music in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 有人在忙着活計，角落裏響着她腳鐲鳴奏的樂音。

sentences.english: Nell joined us before long, and bringing some needle-work to the table.
sentences.chinese: 不久耐兒也來到我們一起，把一些針錢活計放在桌上。
